column2:
"So this is the end. Hmm...
I feel like something came back to me when we were in the Tundra."
"I had a sudden flash of inspiration too, but mine was back in the Forest at the start. Let's head back ASAP."

"I am curious about the strong feelings I sensed from these ruins...
Unfortunately, the horns on my head felt like they were about to fall off more than a few times..."
